Site_description: Pelagic deep hole site of Carvins Cove Reservoir near dam (also site 6 for Ironman sampling); the closest access point to the dam via boat and 21 m at full pond
Pelagic site directly at the dam sampled from dam walkway (site of sensors); can be sampled to 19m at full pond
Inflow stream site to Carvins Cove Reservoir at Sawmill Branch inflow closest to reservoir (downstream of 301)
